revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Ruckus Wireless |model=ZoneFlex 7441 |revision=(ZF7441) |asin=B00OY9JTS2,B00QUEKH58 |fcc_date=06/14/2013 |manuf_country=Malaysia |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=EoL |type=access point |fcc_id=S9GZF7441 |ic_id=5912A-ZF7441 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR9342 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR9342 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn |wi1_ant_conn=N-Female |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=DAS |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=super |default_pass=sp-admin |oui=54:3D:37 |oui_eth=54:3D:37 }} {{TagLine|Dual Band 802.11n DAS Access Point}}
"PULI", "Â©2013 Ruckus Wireless Inc.", and the ''Ruckus Wireless'' logo :(barking dog) is silkscreened on the board.
The OUI used in the entry (54:3D:37) is per the FCC EUT's :sample label and board MAC label. The COO is specified as Malaysia on the FCC sample label. :Default settings are per the FCC QSG.
===Links=== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Distributed_Antenna_System ''DAS - Distributed Antenna System'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[http://www.ruckussecurity.com/ZoneFlex-7441.asp ''Ruckus ZoneFlex 7441'' on '''RuckusSecurity''']
===Power adapters=== The power adapters in the FCC docs are.. *for PoE: :'''Ruckus Wireless''' PA1060-480T1A125, P/N: 740-64156-001 :(100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 1.8A -> 48VDC, 1.25A, 60W max.) <!--efficiency level IV--> *for standard use: :'''Ruckus Wireless''' ADS-18C-12N 12018GPCU, P/N: 740-54129-001 :(100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, max. 0.5A -> 12VDC, 1.5A) <!--efficiency level IV-->
===See also=== *[[List of Ruckus Wireless Devices]] *[http://sourceforge.net/p/netdisco/mibs/ci/52f0911e42a1a29b6b0fa3f53895543a8c88a5da/tree/ruckus/RUCKUS-PRODUCTS-MIB.txt ''NetDisco'' on '''SF'''] (ZF - ZoneFlex, VF - MediaFlex)
